page.title: 18Industry around Rhos 2
page.content: The clay then goes through a cutter which cuts the tiles exactly to size. The tiles are then dried before finally being rie in a huge gas kiln at a temperature of 1100 degrees centigrade.The whole process takes between 4 and 14 days. When the tiles have been cooled they are checked before being put into boxes.They are then sent put to customers all over the world including Canada and Australia. There are many other factories in this area producing a whole raange of goods such as clothing,plastic products and ceramics in addition to several engineering firms producing metal goods.
